articles.description: Tipped by many to take the next step and end their long wait for a Premier League title this season, is Arsenal's challenge already over?
articles.title: Arsenal's Premier League title challenge faltering - what is going wrong with the Gunners?

articles.description: A spectacular maiden ODI century from stand-in captain Liam Livingstone helps England defeat West Indies by five wickets.
articles.title: West Indies vs England: Liam Livingstone blasts England to victory

articles.description: England miss out in a dramatic finale against New Zealand as Mark Tele'a's try proves decisive at Twickenham.
articles.title: England 22-24 New Zealand: All Blacks edge out hosts thanks to Mark Tele'a try

articles.description: Mohamed Salah’s winner against Brighton, taking Liverpool top of the Premier League table, is a timely reminder of what the Reds could lose if contract talks do not go well.
articles.title: Why Liverpool contract talks for Salah, Van Dijk and Alexander-Arnold are crucial

articles.description: Manchester City's 32-game unbeaten run in the Premier League is over, we take a look at how their record compares to other unbeaten runs in the top flight.
articles.title: 'We couldn't handle Bournemouth' - how Man City's 32-game unbeaten run ended

articles.description: Qualifying at the Sao Paulo Grand Prix has been postponed until Sunday as a result of heavy rain.
articles.title: Brazilian GP 2024: Qualifying set for Sunday after rain delays

articles.description: Several La Liga managers believe matches in the Spanish top flight should have been cancelled this weekend following catastrophic flooding in Valencia.
articles.title: Valencia floods: La Liga managers criticise decision to play weekend games

articles.description: Darcy Graham has a dream return to the Test arena, scoring four tries as Scotland begin their Autumn Series with a thumping win over Fiji at Murrayfield.
articles.title: Darcy Graham scores four in Scotland's nine-try win over Fiji

articles.description: Listen to live Sportsound commentary and follow text coverage as Celtic and Aberdeen meet at Hampden in the Scottish League Cup semi-finals.
articles.title: Scottish League Cup: Celtic & Aberdeen meet in semi-finals

articles.description: Aryna Sabalenka continues her dominance over Zheng Qinwen with victory in the first match of the season-ending WTA Finals.
articles.title: WTA Finals 2024: Aryna Sabalenka beats Zheng Qinwen; Elena Rybakina loses to Jasmine Paolini
